p: (2) Modification of Substituents at Position 4 of the 1,4-DHP Ring. Variations of several types of substituents in position 4 of the DHP ring of 3,5-bis(diethyloxycarbonyl)-1,4-DHPs were performed. Compounds with phenyl (comp. 1– 5), substituted phenyl (2-difluoromethylphenyl (comp. 7 and 9), trifluoromethyl (comp. 6)), and ethoxycarbonyl (comp. 8) substituents were obtained, but no significant influence on the cytotoxicity of the tested 1,4-DHP amphiphiles was observed. Introducing an HO-substituent in a phenyl moiety in position 4 of the 1,4-DHP ring gives comp. 18 and 19 which are 4-(4′-hydroxyphenyl) analogues of corresponding 4-phenyl-DHPs 10 and 12, respectively. It was demonstrated that the introduction of an HO-substituent does not give a strong influence on the cytotoxicity of the compounds.
